headline: Zebra Technologies Introduces New AI Solutions to Empower Retail Frontline Operations
summary: LINCOLNSHIRE, Ill., January 09, 2025--Zebra Technologies introduces new AI solutions to empower retail frontline operations, which will be showcased at NRF 2025 Retail’s Big Show.
